actions.committee: Senate Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to designate certain lands as wilderness.

summary.text: Designates various lands in the following National parks and monuments as wilderness areas: (1) Isle Royale National Park, Michigan; (2) Sequoia and Kings Canyon National Parks, California; (3) Shenandoah National Park, Virginia; (4) North Cascades National Park, Washington; (5) Colorado National Monument, Colorado; (6) Bryce Canyon National Park, Utah; (7) Chiricahua National Monument, Arizona; (8) Black Canyon of the Gunnison National Monument, Colorado; (9) Badlands National Monument, South Dakota; Theodore Roosevelt National Memorial Park, North Dakota; (10) Cumberland Gap National Historical Park, Tennessee; (11) Carlsbad Caverns National Park, New Mexico; (12) Great Sand Dunes National Monument, Colorado; (13) Guadalupe Mountains National Park, Texas; (14) Grand Canyon National Park; (15) Yosemite National Park, California; (16) Grand Teton National Park, Wyoming; (17) Yellowstone National Park, Idaho; Haleakala National Park, Hawaii; and (18) Pinnacles National Monument, California.

titles.title: A bill to designate certain lands as wilderness.
